name: Body Ai
description: Body Ai is an innovative health and fitness app available in web and Android versions that offers users a comprehensive platform for improving their overall well-being. The app provides a range of features, including personalized nutrition recommendations, sleep and water balance tracking, and fitness routines. Another exciting feature of Body Ai is its personal fitness and nutrition assistant, powered by GPT-3 algorithms. This Telegram bot provides users with a personalized and interactive experience, offering tailored recommendations and guidance for achieving their fitness and nutrition goals. The "Fitness tracker" feature of our app is an all-in-one solution for anyone who wants to get fit and healthy. The "Nutrition tracker" feature of our app is designed to help users achieve their dietary goals by providing them with personalized recommendations and tracking their progress. The "Water balance tracker" feature of our app is an essential tool for maintaining good health. This feature allows users to track their water intake throughout the day, ensuring that they stay hydrated and healthy. The Sleep Tracker feature in our app is designed to help users improve the quality of their sleep. The app tracks the different phases of sleep, including light sleep, deep sleep, and REM sleep, and provides insights into the duration and quality of each phase. Token BAIT was launched with IDO on Pinksale https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0xec9E1B8f04f208274eb4649B07296fA07f7f04b7?chain=BSC by a team based in Belarus.
